title: Game won't load after Champions select
body: I was playing a game the other morning and everything worked fine. I went back to play that night and it will match me with a game and let me choose a champion but once champion selection closes out, I only get a black screen but I can still see my mouse cursor. When I was playing in a party with my friend, he got into the game and it just said I wasn't connected to the game. I have tried deleting the program from my computer and reinstalling and had no luck with that. If anyone can help me that would be awesome. I have a MAC btw if that makes any difference.

replies.body: I have this exact same issue, and have done the exact same thing windows 7. It started in a ranked game yesterday(5/11), and still continues this morning(5/12).
Have you had any luck with your game? What did you have to modify if you fixed it? Mine is still doing the same thing?

Generally speaking, this means that you're unable to connect to the game server.  Once champ select ends, your connection to the client goes dormant and goes "Sup server, rseig is ready for game now".  When that doesn't happen, you get to look at that sick black screen.

I'd go ahead and look at our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) article which goes over some of the common reason for various types of connection issues.  Lemme know if it helps :D
